thread.title: BRIEF-Hain Celestial Group Reports Q2 EPS Of $0.45

title: BRIEF-Hain Celestial Group Reports Q2 EPS Of $0.45
text:
39 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Hain Celestial Group Reports Q2 EPS Of $0.45 Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Hain Celestial Group Inc: 
* HAIN CELESTIAL REPORTS SECOND QUARTER FISCAL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q2 ADJUSTED OPERATING EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.45 * Q2 SALES ROSE 5 PERCENT TO $775.2 MILLION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.45 
* SEES FISCAL YEAR 2018 NET SALES OF $2.967 BILLION TO $3.036 BILLION * EXPLORES DIVESTITURE OF HAIN PURE PROTEIN 
* REITERATED ITS NET SALES OUTLOOK AND UPDATED ITS ADJUSTED EPS AND ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018 
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.42, REVENUE VIEW $775.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* HAIN CELESTIAL - SEES FISCAL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EPS OF $1.64 TO $1.75, INCLUDES AN $.08 TO $.09 BENEFIT DUE TO TAX REFORM 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.65, REVENUE VIEW $2.99 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
